Package adrenaline.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • adrenaline.controller.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimerCallBack
    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerCallBack
    This class implements the controller part of the MVC design pattern. An instance is created when a new game begins, and then data is received and sent using command pattern. When the player timer runs out, this class is used as callback.

      • setSpawnPoint

        public void setSpawnPoint​(java.lang.String nickname,
                          java.lang.String color)
        Method to set the spawn point for each client. When all clients have spawned, the game starts
        Parameters:
        nickname - of the client that chose their spawn point
        color - of the chosen spawn point's room

      • informOfDisconnection

        public void informOfDisconnection​(java.lang.String nickname)
        Method to handle player disconnection during game. If the disconnection occurs before all players have spawned, the client is removed from the players' list in the game model. Otherwise, the player is added to the list of dummy players.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of disconnected client

      • informOfReconnection

        public void informOfReconnection​(java.lang.String nickname)
        Method to add a player that reconnected back into the game by removing them from the list of dummy players.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of reconnected client

      • endGameBecauseOfDisconnection

        public void endGameBecauseOfDisconnection()
        Method to end the game if the amount of players left is less than three

        public void buildAction​(java.lang.String type,
                        java.lang.String nickname)
        Method to build a new action during player turn.
        Parameters:
        type - of action to build
        nickname - of the player building the action

      • executeAction

        public void executeAction​(java.lang.String nickname,
                          int squareId)
        Method to execute a Move or MoveAndGrabAction (if the square chosen is not a spawn point) after the client chose the square to move to.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of player performing action
        squareId - of square to move to

      • executeAction

        public void executeAction​(java.lang.String nickname,
                          int squareId,
                          java.lang.String weaponName)
        Method to execute a MoveAndGrabAction if the square chosen is a spawn point.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of player performing the action
        squareId - of square to move to
        weaponName - of the weapon grabbed from spawn point

      • reloadWeapon

        public void reloadWeapon​(java.lang.String nickname,
                         boolean positive,
                         java.lang.String weaponName)
        Method to reload selected weapon.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of player reloading the weapon
        positive - true if the player wants to reload, false otherwise
        weaponName - of weapon to reload

      • reloadWeaponBeforeShoot

        public void reloadWeaponBeforeShoot​(java.lang.String nickname,
                                    boolean positive,
                                    java.lang.String weaponName)
        Method to ask the client if they want to reload their weapon before shooting in final frenzy
        Parameters:
        nickname - of current player
        positive - is they want to reload, false otherwise
        weaponName - is the name of the weapon to reload

      • discardWeapon

                          java.lang.String weaponName)
        Method to discard a weapon if the limit of 3 is exceeded.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of player discarding the weapon
        weaponName - of weapon to discard

                            java.lang.String weaponName)
        Method to send the available weapon effects to the client.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of current player
        weaponName - of weapon chosen to shoot

                       int effectId)
        Method to build the targets of the shoot action
        Parameters:
        nickname - of current player
        effectId - of effect chosen

      • setTargets

        public void setTargets​(java.lang.String nickname,
                       java.util.List<AtomicTarget> targets,
                       java.lang.String targetingScopeNickname)
        Method to set the chosen targets for the shoot action.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of current player
        targets - are the chosen targets to hit
        targetingScopeNickname - is the nickname of the player that is hit by Targeting Scope power up

      • usePowerUpAsAmmo

                             java.lang.String powerUpName)
        Method to use power up cards as bonus ammo.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of current player
        powerUpName - of the power up chosen as bonus ammo

      • choosePowerUpOption

                                java.lang.String powerUpName)
        Method to ask the player in which way they want to use their power up.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of current player
        powerUpName - of the power up chosen

      • usePowerUpEffect

        public void usePowerUpEffect​(java.lang.String nickname,
                             java.lang.String targetName,
                             int squareId)
        Method to apply the power up's effect.
        Parameters:
        nickname - of current player
        targetName - is the nickname of the player hit by the power up
        squareId - is the id of the square chosen for movement effect

      • useTagback

        public void useTagback​(boolean toBeUsed,
                       java.lang.String user,
                       java.lang.String target)
        Method to apply Tagback Grenade effect if the player that has been hit wants to use the power up.
        Parameters:
        toBeUsed - true if the target wants to use it, false otherwise
        user - is the nickname of the target using the power up
        target - is the nickname of the player hit by the power up

      • timerCallBack

        public void timerCallBack()
        Callback function for map set up time out. If the first player doesn't select a map in the set amount of time, it gets initialized to the default one (small).
        Specified by:
        timerCallBack in interface TimerCallBack

      • timerCallBack

        public void timerCallBack​(java.lang.String nickname)
        Callback function for turn time out.
        Specified by:
        timerCallBack in interface TimerCallBack
        Parameters:
        nickname - of the player that didn't make a move in the set amount of time.
